name: Order of Saint George
description:
In this game, you are one of the guard of Saint George's castle, who have to decide whether or not travellers can enter the city. To do so, Saint Georges gives you new rules everyday that you have to respect if you don't wan't to be executed by him!

This game was created for the 2019 Pizza Jam in 48 hours, where I chose the theme " Order of Saint Georges".
